roleset.name: admit

role.descr: secondary predication, attribute of arg 1 acknowledged

example.name: acknowledge a sentence
example.text: [Control Data's semiconductor business, VTC Inc., continues to lose money]-1, the executives acknowledged *trace*-1, but they said they consider some of the technology vital to national defense and so are reluctant to dispose of it.

example.name: acknowledge an NP
example.text: *trace*-1 Apparently acknowledging weaker U.S. sales systemwide, [McDonald's]-1 vowed ``to use our size and muscle to do all that is necessary to build the brand.''

example.name: with hearer
example.text: John acknowledged to Mary that he was an idiot.

example.name: with attributive
example.text: John acknowledged Mary as his illegitimate child--a claim she denied vigorously, on the grounds that she's older than he is.

roleset.note: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls consider-29.9-1, confess-37.10. Comparison with 'claim'.
